short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload an image to use as a custom cursor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Custom Cursor allows you to personalize your browsing experience by uploading any image to use as your custom cursor. 
Features:
- Upload any image and turn it into your browser cursor.
- Disable or enable the custom cursor anytime.
- Automatically resizes images for optimal usability.

Why install this extension?
If you're tired of the default cursor, Dynamic Custom Cursor adds a personal touch to your browsing. Perfect for anyone looking to add some fun and customization to their experience!
